RESUME_TIPS: In your experience at Organic Mandya Food PVT LTD, quantify your impact on inventory. For example, mention any improvements in **inventory turnover ratio** achieved using **Power BI dashboards**, such as a **15% reduction in overstock**.

Expand on your experience with **Power BI** by detailing how you automated reporting. Specifically, mention automating inventory reports, improving forecast accuracy by **10%**, and ensuring **dashboard adherence** in the role.

In your project descriptions, include details on **demand forecasting** techniques you've used. For example, state that you used **historical sales data and seasonality** to predict demand, leading to a **5% reduction in stockouts**.

Highlight your understanding of inventory management concepts by adding **ABC classification** and **EOQ (Economic Order Quantity)** to your skills. Describe how youâ€™ve applied these to optimize stock levels, leading to a **10% reduction in holding costs**.
Include experience with **replenishment** and **allocation** strategies. Detail how you defined and managed **min/max levels** for a product category, improving **store fill rate** by **8%**.
Add details about your experience with **inventory optimization**. For example, mention how you identified slow-moving items and implemented strategies to improve **inventory turnover** by **12%**.

Mention experience with retail inventory planning tools. Even if limited, mention any exposure to systems like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**, and how you leveraged them for **inventory planning**.

Elaborate on your experience with **Excel modeling** within the context of forecasting. Showcase how you built models to predict demand or manage inventory, achieving a **7% improvement in forecast accuracy**.

When discussing your **Power BI** projects, explain how you built dashboards to monitor inventory health. Mention specific KPIs like **stock out percentages** and **overstock percentages**, contributing to a **5% reduction in lost sales**.

In your summary, mention your experience with **omnichannel inventory**. If you've dealt with both retail and online inventory, highlight how you managed the complexities of an **omnichannel** setup, leading to a **10% improvement in order fulfillment rates**.

Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of supply chain planning, including demand forecasting and inventory management.

Inventory Planning.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management: How to Optimize Inventory
Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: This course covers inventory control techniques and teaches how to improve inventory efficiency.
A comprehensive guide to inventory management principles and practices.

Replenishment.DESCRIPTION: Learn advanced techniques for optimizing replenishment strategies using data analytics.
Learn how to plan and execute effective inventory replenishment strategies.
A video tutorial on inventory control and replenishment methods.

Allocation.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to optimize product allocation in retail using analytical tools.
Optimize supply chain processes including product allocation using various models and techniques.
Explanation on the principles of inventory allocation in supply chain management.

Inventory Optimization.DESCRIPTION: Explore advanced inventory optimization techniques to reduce costs and improve efficiency.
Master inventory optimization strategies and processes from start to finish.
Video explaining inventory management best practices and optimization strategies.

Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Learn the statistical models and methods to improve demand forecasting accuracy.
Master demand planning process and improve forecast accuracy using real-world examples.
Understanding demand forecasting principles and methods.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Learn about inventory classification including ABC analysis to prioritize items.
A complete course on using ABC analysis for inventory management.
Explains how to conduct ABC analysis for effective inventory control.

EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Learn to use the Economic Order Quantity (EOQ) model to optimize inventory orders.
This course teaches you how to calculate EOQ and use it in inventory management.
Video tutorial on the EOQ calculation and its application in inventory management.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Get started with NetSuite ERP, covering essential modules including inventory management.
Learn the fundamental concepts and features of NetSuite, including how to manage inventory.
Guide on setting up and managing inventory within NetSuite ERP system.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Master Zoho Inventory and learn to manage your entire inventory process end-to-end.
An in-depth guide to Zoho Inventory, covering every feature and function.
Get started with Zoho Inventory by learning the basics of the system.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Training course focused on inventory management within the Unicommerce platform.
A tutorial on using the Unicommerce platform for inventory management.

Excel modeling.DESCRIPTION: Learn financial modeling in Excel, with advanced techniques for forecasting.

Excel modeling.COURSE_NAME: Microsoft Excel - Data Analysis, Dashboard and Reporting
Excel modeling.DESCRIPTION: Build Excel models and dashboards to perform data analysis and reporting.
Excel tips and tricks for business analytics and modeling.
